name: Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension
description:
Runic Defenders: Trials of Ascension is an action game where you can strengthen your characters by collecting XP materials. In this game, you have four different characters, each with their own unique abilities and weapons, fighting against enemies from all sides. You inflict damage on the enemies by using your characters' skills and earn XP materials by killing them. You can use these materials to upgrade your characters and make them more powerful.

With your team of characters, including a mage, a long-range fighter, and two close-range fighters, try to survive against enemies with different abilities, and strive for personal achievement. Use your unique skills, tactical moves, and strategic thinking to defeat other teams.
